这事其实还真挺像之前英雄学院的那个事，要非常细的掰扯才能看明白
Invoke Drejudice这张牌插画长得像KKK加上文字不说了，牌的编号是1488
14 代表着“白人力量运动”的 14 字真言，8 则代表着字母表里第 8 个字母——H，而两个“8”代表两个“H”，代表的是Heil Hitler的缩写，意为“希特勒万岁。” 这个“密码”通常写为“1488”或“14/88”。通常一些种族主义商店出售的商品都标价为14.88美元。
这个怀疑多年前就有：
https://www.reddit.com/r/magicTC ... e_is_the_kkk_right/
https://www.reddit.com/r/magicTC ... hy_does_this_exist/
这个是关于插画作者Harold McNeill的评论，现在牌已经被删除看不见了
Just an FYI, about the artist, Harold McNeill:
I met him in '95 at WotC's Artist's Caravan along with other Magic artists. I expressed to him my enjoyment of his (I thought absurd) art for Invoke Prejudice. He lit up, and said I might be interested in some of his other art, then. He pulled out a couple artbooks filled with racist and Nazi-inspired art. Creeped out beyond belief, I sheepishly thanked him and got the hell away from that table as quick as I could. There's a reason why he has done almost zero professional work for a long time. His MySpace confirms he's a complete racist nutjob. I'd say "not that there's anything wrong with that", but this is the 21st century, and YEAH - THERE'S SOMETHING WRONG WITH THAT.
这个插画作者的官方网站：
https://haroldarthurmcneill.weebly.com/

可以理解这张是万智牌黑人圈长期对这个有联想的牌，如今因为Zaiem Beg那篇文章虽然日常事务写了很多，但大家懒得看没石锤的，结尾提到25年还没人解决这张牌的事情，所以爆发了
